# Using Integral to catch up

Students miss lessons for a whole number of reasons. Maybe a music lesson, illness, a sports game, etc.

**Integral has you covered.**

### How to catch up

1.  Find our from a classmate or your teacher what you missed in the lesson

2.  Find the relevant section of Integral

::: callout-tip
## Tip!

When in the correct course, use the 'Topics' menu button to see the whole course broken into topics and chapters
:::

3.  Go to the learn section and find the video covering the topic you missed. **Every** topic of A level maths and further maths is covered in a teaching video.
